vaaqif hai ham bhi kub har ek itaqaam se
manzil pe pahunchege kaise, aapaka jab tak saath nahi
nahee lat aur uljhan me pad jayegee
chalati naiya roke aandhi roke aandhi, haiyya ho haiyya re haiyya, haiyya ho
safar badaa hi pyaara humdum laankhon armaan waqt bahot kam
dewano dewano dekho na
yu tadap ke na tadpa mujhe bar bar, koi aata hai
teri raaho se guzare jaba se ham, jaba se ham
ghar me bhigi billi ghar ghar ka dastur yahi hai
dur tak nigaaho me hai gul khile hue
teri bholi bhale surat se
kaun hai vo dilruba, are kaho na hamse zara
gamo ki aag hamne khud lagaayi, aap kyo roye
sun le kya kahti hai payal
tumko piya dil diya kitne naaz se ho
ho maine pyar kiya oy hoye kya jurm kiya
kahiye to aasmaan ko zamin par utaar laye
ghar me ho mushkil to daftar le chalo
bit hi jaaye na tanha ye jawani
phul bane hai ghungharu, ghungharu ban gae phul
adhikar ye jabase sajan ka har dhadakan par mana maine
o baagon mein bahaar hai, hai
ab aath pahar in aankhon mein
is liye, ki bhanvara tumhaari hansi na udaye
naa jane kya hua jo tune chhu liya
par sabase pyara hai sajana hamara
haye re haye jaan ghabaraye
karam kiye ja fal ki ichha
to jod jaayege haay haay
malik hai tere sath na dar gam se tu ye dil
bhule se naam na lo pyaar ka
hai wallah jawaab tumhaara nahee hai
phir aisi ghadi aai  phir aisi ghadi aai
roz roz roz roz dekhu tujhe nai nai lage
dosti ka yaro nahi koyi dham
sukh hai ek chhanv dhalti aati hai jati hai
maza jab hai tumhari har ada katil hi kahlaye
hamne jo, dekha tha suna tha, kya bataye vo kya tha
vo bevafa jo kahe hamko jaana hai, ye dil
upar wala panseri hai upar wala panseri hai
